languages.text: К сожалению, разведчики, направленные туда Лорд-капитаном, не смогли зафиксировать лагеря повстанцев — слишком велико было искусство маскировки богохульных покровителей мятежа, ксеносов.

traits.locale_text: К сожалению, разведчики, направленные туда Лордом-капитаном, не смогли зафиксировать лагеря повстанцев — слишком велико было искусство маскировки богохульных покровителей мятежа, ксеносов.

languages.text: Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.
languages.original_text: К сожалению, разведчики, направленные туда Лорд-капитаном, не смогли зафиксировать лагеря повстанцев — слишком велико было искусство маскировки богохульных покровителей мятежа, ксеносов.

traits.locale_text: Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.

Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.

Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.

Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.

languages.text: 残念ながら、ロード・キャプテンが当該地域に送った斥候部隊は反乱軍の潜伏場所を突き止められなかった。反乱軍を支持する不敬の輩、異種族による高度なカモフラージュを見破れなかったのだ。
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.

traits.locale_text: 残念ながら、ロード・キャプテンが当該地域に送った斥候部隊は反乱軍の潜伏場所を突き止められなかった。反乱軍を支持する不敬の輩、異種族による高度なカモフラージュを見破れなかったのだ。

languages.text: 遗憾的是，舰长大人派往该地区的侦察兵未能找到叛军的藏身之处。叛军邪恶的异形领袖为叛乱分子提供了先进的伪装，侦察兵未能看穿伪装。
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.

traits.locale_text: 遗憾的是，舰长大人派往该地区的侦察兵未能找到叛军的藏身之处。叛军邪恶的异形领袖为叛乱分子提供了先进的伪装，侦察兵未能看穿伪装。

languages.text: Lamentablemente, los exploradores que {mf|el Lord Capitán|la Lord Capitán} envió a esa zona fueron incapaces de localizar el escondite de los rebeldes; no pudieron penetrar el camuflaje avanzado que les habían proporcionado sus impíos aliados, los xenos.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Lamentablemente, los exploradores que {mf|el Lord Capitán|la Lord Capitán} envió a esa zona fueron incapaces de localizar el escondite de los rebeldes; no pudieron penetrar el camuflaje avanzado que les habían proporcionado sus impíos aliados, los xenos.

languages.text: Leider gelang es den vom Lord Captain in diese Gegend geschickten Spähern nicht, das Versteck der Rebellen zu finden – sie konnten die fortschrittliche Tarnung nicht aushebeln, die die Rebellen von ihren gottlosen Unterstützern, den Xenos, erhalten hatten.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Leider gelang es den vom Lord Captain in diese Gegend geschickten Spähern nicht, das Versteck der Rebellen zu finden – sie konnten die fortschrittliche Tarnung nicht aushebeln, die die Rebellen von ihren gottlosen Unterstützern, den Xenos, erhalten hatten.

languages.text: Malheureusement, les éclaireurs envoyés dans cette zone par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} furent incapables de localiser le repaire des rebelles. Le camouflage avancé dont profitaient les insurgés grâce au soutien des xénos se révéla impossible à pénétrer.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Malheureusement, les éclaireurs envoyés dans cette zone par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} furent incapables de localiser le repaire des rebelles. Le camouflage avancé dont profitaient les insurgés grâce au soutien des xénos se révéla impossible à pénétrer.

languages.text: Ne yazık ki Lord Kaptan'ın bölgeye gönderdiği keşif erleri, isyancıların sığınağının konumunu saptamayı başaramadı. İsyancılara faziletsiz yandaşları olan zenolar tarafından verilen gelişmiş kamuflaj, erlerin başarılı olmasına engel oldu.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, the scouts sent to that area by the Lord Captain failed to locate the rebels' hideout — they could not penetrate the advanced camouflage provided to the rebels by their ungodly backers, the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Ne yazık ki Lord Kaptan'ın bölgeye gönderdiği keşif erleri, isyancıların sığınağının konumunu saptamayı başaramadı. İsyancılara faziletsiz yandaşları olan zenolar tarafından verilen gelişmiş kamuflaj, erlerin başarılı olmasına engel oldu.
